title: Enefit Green to divest Finnish wind farm to TD Greystone Infrastructure Fund
description: The wind farm has an installed capacity of 76MW and a 72MW grid export capacity.
content: Enefit Green has agreed to divest its Tolpanvaara wind farm in Finland to TD Greystone Infrastructure Fund, as part of a strategy to concentrate on the Polish and Baltic markets, for nearly 83m ($96.… [+2305 chars]
